text: The Czech and Slovak Testing Board (CaSTB) is a non-profit professional organization that supports and promotes the discipline of software testing in Slovakia and the Czech Republic. It is one of the many software testing certification boards that are national member boards within the International Software Testing Qualifications Board (ISTQB).https://www.root.cz/clanky/co- to-znamena-poradne-otestovat-webovou-aplikaci/ == History == The Czech and Slovak Testing Board was founded in 2006 as a non-profit organization, an association of specialists dedicated to good practices in software testing as well as information systems. The Board consists of volunteer testing experts from a wide range of organizations: the IT industry, consultancies, training providers and other professional and scientific/academic communities. The CaSTB is a Member Board of the ISTQB and as such, it is the single legal representative of ISTQB in Czech Republic and Slovakia. === Certifications === The CaSTB offers the following certifications: *ISTQB CT Foundation (CTFL) *ISTQB CT Foundation Agile Tester Extension (CTFL-AT) *ISTQB CT Advanced Test Manager (CTAL-TM) *ISTQB CT Advanced Test Analyst (CTAL-TA) *ISTQB CT Advanced Technical Test Analyst (CTAL-TTA) *ISTQB CT Advanced Technical Test Automation Engineer (CTAL-TAE) == References == == External links == *Czech and Slovak Testing Board (CaSTB): References page * ISTQB Official Website * Czech and Slovak Testing Board Website Category:Information technology organizations based in the Czech Republic Category:Software testing Category:2006 establishments in the Czech Republic Category:2006 establishments in Slovakia Category:Organizations established in 2006
